entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port aux Basques 02:30 AM NDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
Temperature: -1.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 62 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -8.0°C
Wind: WNW 67 km/h gust 83 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries north of Cape Ray. Blowing snow. Amount 2 cm north of Cape Ray. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 along exposed areas of the coast this evening. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. A few flurries north of Cape Ray in the morning. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the morning. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 20 March 2023
